name: A Bridge Home - TO Jam 2022
description:
A Bridge Home is a relaxing puzzle game where players connect scattered pieces to rebuild bridges in a long forgotten world.

How to play:

- Choose a collection of 6 levels to play in
- Mouse Left Click = Select a Bridge Piece
- Mouse Left Click + Drag = Move Selected Bridge Piece
- Mouse Left Click + Right Click = Rotate Selected Bridge Piece
- Click on the Left and Right arrows at the bottom of the screen to rotate the Level
- Click the "X" Icon to exit to Home Screen
- Click the "rounded arrow" to reload the existing Level

This is a very rough TO Jam 2022 prototype, but I had such a fun time working on this, while watching other talented devs create inspiring projects!

Thanks for taking the time to check this out!
